p: The CPH of M. harttii was constructed using the parameters LQHPT and 0.5 regularization multiplayer ( S4 Appendix). It represents a suitable area corresponding to 0.276% of the M area ( Fig 2; Table 2). The sites north of the São Francisco River show a smaller suitability (21.1%) ( Fig 2A and 2B; Table 2), whereas the largest suitable areas are concentrated southwards the São Francisco River (77.9%) ( Fig 2C and 2D; Table 2). The AICc ( S4 Appendix) and AUCratio ( S5 Appendix) of the model were 0 and 1.516141349, respectively.
